name: Flappy Fighter
description:
HEY FIGHTING GAME FANS!...

Are you tired of downloading giant sized files that use up all available space on your phone just to enjoy a little fighting game action?

Needlessly long booting times and annoying loading in between matches?

Unable to play offline?

Missing moves on virtual D-pads that just don’t work?

Frustrating delay between your button press and your Fighter’s move?

Fighters that are small and spindly?

Sound effects that are more suitable to pillow fighting than Street fighting?

FLAPPY FIGHTER HAS ARRIVED TO END ALL OF THIS! A REVOLUTION in fighting games on iOS has begun!

The first fighters in the game will debut in a different match up every week, continuing with Flappy’s number one rival, the fearless Street brawler ‘Splashy’. He faces off against himself in mirror match for some fast paced solid old skool arcade style fighting action!


FEATURING:

- Best fighting game control system on iPhone.

- Solid, Cool, 2D Retro Arcade GFX!

- Super Combos, Super Cancels, Super Finishes!

- Old Skool Style SFX & Music!

- 3 levels of difficulty to accommodate all skill levels

- Training mode to practice your combos


Punch, Kick, Fireball & Dragon Punch your way to VICTORY in this definitive free-to-play fighting game!


WELCOME TO THE WORLD OF FLAPPY FIGHTER!!!
